1.1.name: wordpress/missing-seo-data
1.1.description:
Missing SEO Data is a plugin which can be useful to those who use popular SEO packs which are available for WordPress to find posts and pages where title, description or keywords are missing. In the past, Spunky Jones had released two individual plugins for the WordPress All in One SEO Pack and Platinum SEO Pack which were known as 'Missing Data - All in One SEO pack' and 'Missing Data - Platinum SEO Pack' respectively.

Where as now, the new Missing SEO Data plugin combines the plugins which are mentioned above and also extends itself by adding support for the SEO Ultimate plugin and WordPress SEO by Yoast. The plugin can be used to find posts and pages which have Titles, Descriptions or Keywords that are missing.

Check out some of the other WordPress plugins by the same author.
